ValidationRule.description: Service Date can not be less than Opp Close Date
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( AND( not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "API" ), not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "Admin" ), Opportunity.CloseDate > ServiceDate , OR( Opportunity.RecordTypeId == $Label.BGA_AM_Short_Cycle, Opportunity.RecordTypeId == $Label.Opportunity_BGA_Recordtype, Opportunity.RecordTypeId == $Label.BGA_Operator ) ), true, false )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Opportunity product can not have Date earlier than Opportunity Close Date.
